Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can draw two students communicating with each other over a distance, showing a string telephone setup.
The student can illustrate a string telephone with cups connected by a string.
The student can use drawings to highlight that the string helps transmit sound between the two students.
The student can depict how the string telephone solves the problem of communicating over a distance, showing them standing far apart.
CANNOT: The student may not clearly show that the string needs to be tight to work effectively (absence of a taut string).
The student might not entirely illustrate the concept of vibration in the string as its method of sound transmission (lacks wavy lines or movement indicators on the string).
